title: Strengthening Pedagogical Practical Competencies: Mastering Basic Biology Concepts Through Online Formative Assessment-Based Programs

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in life sciences
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can correct misconceptions about the five core biology concepts (cell structure, photosynthesis/respiration, gene expression, evolution, and energy flow in ecosystems) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can participate actively in learning via an online formative assessment system at least three times per week and generate error analysis reports.
By the end of the course, over 70% of learners will achieve a grade of C+ or higher on the first biology exam.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
